extendedInfo.description: Listen to BBCEnjoy unlimited accesses to most of the BBC radio stations, including International Radio 1, Radio 1x, Radio 2, Radio 3, Radio 4, Radio 4 Xtra, Radio 5, Radio 5 Sport Extra, Radio 6, Radio Asian Network, BBC National and regional broadcast ...Features :-	Bookmark your favorite stations-	Program Schedule-	Sleep timer-	Recently Played folderNoticeTrademarks and logos belong to respective owners.

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Thank you for making this app.. my local radio station has world service but sometimes I want more... thank you again for the app. It plays in the background as you use other apps. Nice directory not a hassle to find what you\'re looking for.
reviews.author: Jamie Sosis

reviews.title: Better than bbc iplayer radio app!
reviews.comment: This app works all the time every time simple  interface yes, but it works.
reviews.author: Douglas Brown

reviews.title: Unputdownwable
reviews.comment: This is the radio app I eva had. Thank u developers.
reviews.author: Usman Gurama

reviews.title: Philco
reviews.comment: This app is good but sadly seems to be fixed on one stream that has a annoying background noise that is more irritating when using headphones ));
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok when it works.
reviews.comment: Great for listening to your favourite BBC radio station. Unfortunately it continuously and randomly stops streaming or freezes. There is also no way to shut it off aside from doing a \"force stop\" in the applications manager.
reviews.author: Erik Uttuslien

reviews.title: Time out
reviews.comment: The fastness on which the sations are up is amazing, however.... Everytime my screen times-out I lose it.... Work on it and ill install u back up again
reviews.author: carlos lopez

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good application, but BBC Tamil is not included.Please try to include it updates.
reviews.author: jagan mohan

reviews.title: By far the best APP for BBC radio
reviews.comment: Love it.  Simple to use and it works every time.   Great on my new 2013 Nexus 7 with its fabulous sound configuration
reviews.author: Mike Smithson

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: A much needed app since the official version blocks some channels like live sports commentary...
reviews.author: Dattatreya N

reviews.title: Excellent App.
reviews.comment: This is a very nice app, having just about every radio station one could wish for in a simple un-cluttered selection screen. Favourites can be tagged easily for instant access. Smooth streaming even with a slow internet connection.
reviews.author: Peter Jameson

reviews.title: Fabulous!
reviews.comment: I\'m in Taiwan , so i have to find English radio programs like this by myself on the net, however, with this app,i don\'t have to spend so much time on searching something for me to enhance my English ability, thank you so much for providing this app!

reviews.title: Great, simple app
reviews.comment: This app is simple and has tons of BBC radio channels. My only problem with it is the amount of buffering. As someone who has no idea what goes into creating an app, I can\'t hate on it for that. So, great app, simple to use, Radio 1xtra is awesome.
reviews.author: Matt MacDonald

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: finally I got wat I\'ve been looking for. a very reliable app of course.
reviews.author: Abubakar Katsina

reviews.title: Al
reviews.comment: It was good but for a while ago till now it would be launch for few seconds and then there is no voice. Galaxy s3
reviews.author: Ali Kashy

reviews.title: Works half the time
reviews.comment: App does the job...well half the time. Even on my high speed WiFi connection it seems to lose the signal..then it goes blank and then crashes on the Galaxy S3 here in the US...please work on it...also if there can be an option that toggles off the app\'s section on my notification bar and pulldown...that would be great!
reviews.author: Ray Zor

reviews.title: Unable to get my local ststion
reviews.comment: 3counties radio
reviews.author: Anthony Day

reviews.comment: Excellent app.. I can listen to the radio anywhere, anytime.. Good job!! :)
reviews.author: Atul G

reviews.title: No live sports for us in indiapl do samthing then I give five star
reviews.comment: Vivek g y 5360
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Music stops streaming way too frequently.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app.
reviews.comment: A somewhat ugly app, but pretty useful and functional nevertheless.
reviews.author: G\303\274ne\305\237 Artam
